TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell/DataGridViewColumnHeaderCellAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell/DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject

summary.span: 将 的相关信息提供给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。

span.span: Provides information about a to accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体包括允许你的应用程序以使用辅助功能客户端应用程序的内置辅助功能支持。Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications. 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例包括屏幕放大器和审阅者实用工具、 语音输入的实用工具、 屏幕键盘、 其他输入的设备，以及键盘增强实用工具。Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 类继承自类来提供以下信息辅助功能客户端应用程序。The class inherits from the class to provide information about a to accessibility client applications. 每个类表示的可视部件-如， ，和-还包含继承自的类提供有关包含的类信息和执行代表辅助功能客户端应用程序的操作。Each class that represents a visual part of the —such as , , and —also contains a class that inherits from to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications. 有实例时想要提供其他信息，例如名称或描述控件，辅助功能客户端应用程序。There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the control, to accessibility client applications. 有两种方法来提供这些额外信息。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要提供有限的辅助功能信息供现有控件，设置控件的和将报告给具有辅助功能客户端应用程序的属性值。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. > [!NOTE] > 应更改和属性值仅在极少数情况下，例如，如果你使如下所示列表。You should change the and property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a look like a list. 有时，你可能需要更多的辅助功能信息或可访问性不同操作，将您的自定义包括或。Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom or . 若要自定义可访问性，你可以编写您自己的类派生自或类并重写方法。To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the or classes and override the method. 例如，如果你正在编写实现唯一的自定义操作，例如在你的单元格中，特殊命中测试的自定义的行标题单元格应创建继承自的类类并重写方法。For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the class and override the method. 使用来公开其数据结构值来定义数据表层次结构。The exposes its data structure by using values to define the data table hierarchy. 公开到 Microsoft Active Accessibility 数据表的详细信息，请参阅"公开数据表通过 Microsoft Active Accessibility"在 MSDN 库中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

value.span: 描述 默认操作的字符串。

span.span: A string that describes the default action of the

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属于具有的列属性值，此属性将返回字符串"按列进行排序"。If the belongs to a column with a property value of , this property returns the string "Press to sort column". 如果属性控件具有的值或，此属性返回字符串"按下以选择列"。If the property of the control has a value of or , this property returns the string "Press to select column". 如果上述条件均不存在或不当前属于一个列，此属性返回。If neither of these conditions is present or the does not currently belong to a column, this property returns .

summary.span: 定位到另一个辅助性对象。

span.span: An that represents an object in the specified direction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了其中拥有返回方法。The following table describes which owns the that is returned by the method. |参数值Parameter value|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||当前标头单元格右侧。The to the right of the current header cell.| ||当前标头单元格左侧。The to the left of the current header cell.| ||后当前标头单元格。The after the current header cell.| ||之前当前标头单元格。The before the current header cell.| ||第一个 。The first . 返回如果属性是`true`。 returns the if the property is `true`.| ||最后一个。The last .| > [!NOTE] > 方向，方法将转指定时或取决于是否右到左启用了支持。The direction that the method moves when you specify or depends on whether the has right-to-left support enabled. 例如，如果启用从右向左的支持，指定时，将返回相同的可访问对象或。For example, if right-to-left support is enabled, will return the same accessible object when you specify or . 如果未启用从右到左的支持，指定时，将返回相同对象或。If right-to-left support is not enabled, will return the same object when you specify or .

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values.

summary.span: 根据选择模式修改列选择。

span.span: Modifies the column selection depending on the selection mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果所属的单元格不属于某一列，不执行任何操作。If the owning cell does not belong to a column, no action is taken. 否则下, 表描述每个执行的操作`flags`值。Otherwise, the following table describes the action performed for each `flags` value. |参数值Parameter value|操作Action| |---------------------|------------| ||如果包含所属的单元格的控件具有属性值或，选择包含该单元格的列。If the control that contains the owning cell has a property value of or , the column containing the cell is selected.| ||如果选择包含该单元格的列，则将取消所选内容。If the column containing the cell is selected, the selection is canceled.| |所有其他值All other values|不执行任何操作。No action is taken.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property State As AccessibleStates
public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::AccessibleStates State { System::Windows::Forms::AccessibleStates get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值始终包括值。The property value always includes the value. 包括值如果包含该单元格选择。The includes the value if the that contains the cell is selected. 包括时所属的单元格当前未显示的值。The includes the value if the owning cell is not currently displayed.
